channel.title: Stop Pjing [HELP]
channel.description: Say if i was going to kill a player. as soon as i killed that player, someone can instantly attack me and spec me out. Could anyone help me with this? i want to stop this

item.title: Stop Pjing [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

if you have code that awards pk points/ a kill to the killer. then just add (o.newAttackerDelayTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + MILLIS_TO_DELAY;
then in the attack method
if (System.currentTimeMillis() < player_im_attacking.newAttackerDelayTime)
return/false/;? depending on the method
and also if your player with the delay goes to attack someone else, reset the delay time so others can attack him back.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop Pjing [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Search in client.java for this

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - singleCombatDelay >

Change the statement and the statement below into this

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - singleCombatDelay > 9900) {
underAttackBy = 0;
}
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - singleCombatDelay2 > 9900) {
underAttackBy2 = 0;
}
